org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.transmutable.transactions

Class Transaction<DATATYPE,TRANSMUTABLE extends Transmutable<DATATYPE>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.transmutable.transactions.TransmutableSource<DATATYPE,TRANSMUTABLE>
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.transmutable.transactions.Transaction<DATATYPE,TRANSMUTABLE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.Blade, org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBlade
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncTransaction, SyncTransaction

    public abstract class Transaction<DATATYPE,TRANSMUTABLE extends Transmutable<DATATYPE>>
extends TransmutableSource<DATATYPE,TRANSMUTABLE>
implements org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.IsolationBlade
    A composable transaction for updating a TransmutableReference. Transactions are serially reusable, but not thread safe.
